General.Name: Minmetals Capital Co Ltd
General.Description: Minmetals Capital Company Limited engages in the trust, financial leasing, securities, futures, funds, banking, insurance, and other businesses in China. The company was formerly known as Kingray New Materials Science & Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Minmetals Capital Company Limited in March 2017. Minmetals Capital Company Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.
